alert.note: Alert for Hartford (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hartford County through 745 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oakville, or near Waterbury, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... New Britain, Bristol, Southington, Glastonbury, Newington, Wethersfield, Farmington, Berlin, Rocky Hill and Plainville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
